title: Augusta County: J. Kent Langhorne to his mother, May 19, 1863
summary: Langhorne writes to his mother that he likes camp life "so far very much" and shares news from camp and about his horse. He also encloses a letter from Colonel Munford to his mother.
keywords: The letter in this file was apparently enclosed with a letter from Colonel Munford to Langhorne's mother dated May 18, 1863.
